item.title: About
item.description:
This is where I will record the things I have learnt, problems faced and solved!! A place to record the interesting.

This site is generated using hugo.

Topics of interest

  • Languages
    • Ruby
    • Go lang
    • Dart
  • Concepts
    • Algorithms
    • Data structures

You don’t learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and falling over. - Richard Branson
